short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your homepage into a source of daily inspiration & motivation.  With each new tab, you'll be greeted with a unique quote.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with Napkinsights!  This Chrome extension turns your homepage into a source of daily inspiration and motivation.  Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a unique quote, creatively presented on a napkin with hand-drawn sketches.  Whether you need a boost to start your day or a reminder to stay focused, Napkinsights provides the perfect mix of wisdom and visual charm to keep you inspired.  Make every new tab a moment of insight and motivation.

About the Creator:
Napkinsights is the brainchild of Rajesh Setty, a seasoned Silicon Valley entrepreneur, author, and speaker with a passion for bringing creative and impactful ideas to life.  With over two decades of experience in the tech industry and a knack for storytelling, Rajesh created Napkinsights to share thought-provoking quotes and sketches that resonate on a deep, personal level.
